name: Feed The World (Hikinginthedark, efulifufuli, AtlasTTT, 21AKaki, Jiahui (Tino) Hu, philipn1)
name_original: Feed The World (Hikinginthedark, efulifufuli, AtlasTTT, 21AKaki, Jiahui (Tino) Hu, philipn1)
description:
Game website: https://wordpress-311999-3010650.cloudwaysapps.com/
Uncle Bob, a genius scientist, was planning on creating a serum which helps with the regrowing of food and agriculture, however did a slight miscalculation and had suddenly made all the food dangerous and created an almost food-like wonderland! It's up to his two specially designed super soldiers “Bob” and “Rob” to find the source and stop this chaos of food! (Addresses “Zero Hunger”). Bob and Rob must go through this food wonderland and help as many people out while also solving puzzles to see the source. The players can plant seeds as well help by collecting food and sending them on cargo trucks. 

Controls are WASD and Arrow Keys, and is a local multiplayer game. Can you work together and traverse the great food valley? Find out in "Feed the World"
